title: Buffett still hates Bitcoin, wants all of Apple
text:
Buffett still hates Bitcoin, wants all of Apple 2:26pm EDT - 01:08
While billionaire investor Warren Buffett bashed Bitcoin on Monday, he doubled down on his love for Apple, saying he'd ''love to own 100 percent of it.'' ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
While billionaire investor Warren Buffett bashed Bitcoin on Monday, he doubled down on his love for Apple, saying he'd "love to own 100 percent of it." Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KFWwzg
